field.name: MAP
field.description: System memory remap. Value 0x3 is reserved

enumeratedValue.name: BOOT_LOADER_MODE_IN
enumeratedValue.description: Boot Loader Mode. Interrupt vectors are re-mapped to Boot ROM

enumeratedValue.name: USER_RAM_MODE_INTER
enumeratedValue.description: User RAM Mode. Interrupt vectors are re-mapped to Static RAM

enumeratedValue.name: USER_FLASH_MODE_INT
enumeratedValue.description: User Flash Mode. Interrupt vectors are not re-mapped and reside in Flash

field.name: MSEL
field.description: Feedback divider value. The division value M is the programmed MSEL value + 1. 00000: Division ratio M = 1 to 11111: Division ratio M = 32

field.name: PSEL
field.description: Post divider ratio P. The division ratio is 2 x P

field.name: MSEL
field.description: Feedback divider value. The division value M is the programmed MSEL value + 1. 00000: Division ratio M = 1 to 11111: Division ratio M = 32

field.name: PSEL
field.description: Post divider ratio P. The division ratio is 2 x P

enumeratedValue.name: BYPASS_ENABLED_PLL_
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass enabled. PLL input (sys_osc_clk) is fed directly from the XTALIN pin bypassing the oscillator. Use this mode when using an external clock source instead of the crystal oscillator

field.name: FREQRANGE
field.description: Determines frequency range for Low-power oscillator

field.name: DIVSEL
field.description: Select divider for Fclkana. wdt_osc_clk = Fclkana/ (2 x (1 + DIVSEL)) 00000: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 2 00001: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 4 to 11111: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 64

field.name: FREQSEL
field.description: Select watchdog oscillator analog output frequency (Fclkana)

enumeratedValue.name: POR_DETECTED_WRITIN
enumeratedValue.description: POR detected. Writing a one clears this reset

enumeratedValue.name: RESET_DETECTED_WRIT
enumeratedValue.description: Reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

enumeratedValue.name: WDT_RESET_DETECTED_
enumeratedValue.description: WDT reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: BOD
field.description: Status of the Brown-out detect reset

enumeratedValue.name: BOD_RESET_DETECTED_
enumeratedValue.description: BOD reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: SYSRST
field.description: Status of the software system reset

enumeratedValue.name: SYSTEM_RESET_DETECTE
enumeratedValue.description: System reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

register.name: SYSPLLCLKUEN
register.description: System PLL clock source update enable

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable system PLL clock source update

enumeratedValue.name: IRC_THE_USB_PLL_CLO
enumeratedValue.description: IRC. The USB PLL clock source must be switched to system oscillator for correct full-speed USB operation. The IRC is suitable for low-speed USB operation

register.name: USBPLLCLKUEN
register.description: USB PLL clock source update enable

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable USB PLL clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: System AHB clock divider values 0: System clock disabled. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SYS
field.description: Enables the clock for the AHB, the APB bridge, the Cortex-M0 FCLK and HCLK, SysCon, and the PMU. This bit is read only and always reads as 1

field.name: FLASHREG
field.description: Enables clock for flash register interface

field.name: FLASHARRAY
field.description: Enables clock for flash array access

field.name: USB
field.description: Enables clock to the USB register interface

field.name: IOCON
field.description: Enables clock for I/O configuration block

field.name: PINT
field.description: Enables clock to GPIO Pin interrupts register interface

field.name: GROUP0INT
field.description: Enables clock to GPIO GROUP0 interrupt register interface

field.name: GROUP1INT
field.description: Enables clock to GPIO GROUP1 interrupt register interface

field.name: RAM1
field.description: Enables SRAM1 block at address 0x2000 0000. See Section 3.1 for availability of this bit

field.name: USBRAM
field.description: Enables USB SRAM block at address 0x2000 4000

field.name: DIV
field.description: SPI0_PCLK clock divider values. 0: System clock disabled. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: UART_PCLK clock divider values 0: Disable UART_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: SSP1_PCLK clock divider values 0: Disable SSP1_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SEL
field.description: USB clock source. Values 0x2 and 0x3 are reserved

field.name: DIV
field.description: USB clock divider values 0: Disable USB clock. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: CLKOUT clock divider values 0: Disable CLKOUT clock divider. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: PIOSTAT
field.description: State of PIO0_23 through PIO0_0 at power-on reset

field.name: PIOSTAT
field.description: State of PIO1_31 through PIO1_0 at power-on reset

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_0_THE_RESET_A
enumeratedValue.description: Level 0: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 1.46 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 1.63 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_1_THE_RESET_A
enumeratedValue.description: Level 1: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 2.06 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.15 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_2_THE_RESET_A
enumeratedValue.description: Level 2: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 2.35 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.43 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_3_THE_RESET_A
enumeratedValue.description: Level 3: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 2.63 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.71 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_1THE_INTERRUP
enumeratedValue.description: Level 1:The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.22 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.35 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_2_THE_INTERRU
enumeratedValue.description: Level 2: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.52 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.66 V

enumeratedValue.name: LEVEL_3_THE_INTERRU
enumeratedValue.description: Level 3: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.80 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.90 V

register.name: IRQLATENCY
register.description: IQR delay. Allows trade-off between interrupt latency and determinism

field.name: IRQNO
field.description: The IRQ number of the interrupt that acts as the Non-Maskable Interrupt (NMI) if bit 31 is 1. See Table 58 for the list of interrupt sources and their IRQ numbers

field.name: NMIEN
field.description: Write a 1 to this bit to enable the Non-Maskable Interrupt (NMI) source selected by bits 4:0

field.name: INTPIN
field.description: Pin number select for pin interrupt. (PIO0_0 to PIO0_23 correspond to numbers 0 to 23 and PIO1_0 to PIO1_31 correspond to numbers 24 to 55)

field.name: POL_CLK
field.description: USB need_clock polarity for triggering the USB wake-up interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING_EDGE_OF_THE_
enumeratedValue.description: Falling edge of the USB need_clock triggers the USB wake-up (default)

enumeratedValue.name: RISING_EDGE_OF_THE_U
enumeratedValue.description: Rising edge of the USB need_clock triggers the USB wake-up

register.name: STARTERP0
register.description: Start logic 0 interrupt wake-up enable register 0

register.name: STARTERP1
register.description: Start logic 1 interrupt wake-up enable register 1

field.name: BOD_PD
field.description: BOD power-down control for Deep-sleep and Power-down mode

field.name: WDTOSC_PD
field.description: Watchdog oscillator power-down control for Deep-sleep and Power-down mode

register.name: PDAWAKECFG
register.description: Power-down states for wake-up from deep-sleep
